pullrequest.title: Fix gazebo9 build and run on Windows.

content.raw:
Thanks for the PR!

* Retriggered the Homebrew build because there was an infrastructure failure: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/
* The Ubuntu Nvidia build has more GUI errors than expected, with some fatal errors and some `'scene != NULL' returned FALSE.`. I think this could be caused by the changes on this PR, but I'm triggering a new build just to be sure: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/
content.html:
Thanks for the PR!

  • Retriggered the Homebrew build because there was an infrastructure failure: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/
  • The Ubuntu Nvidia build has more GUI errors than expected, with some fatal errors and some 'scene != NULL' returned FALSE.. I think this could be caused by the changes on this PR, but I'm triggering a new build just to be sure: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/
